Articles.Content:
I smash a class E asteroid into your computer. 

My lovely Dres and Gilly and Eve debris field and broken computer!

I wait for gravity to turn your debris field into a hill.

Now I have a hill, and you no have Dres.

Me nuke your hill (again) and edit Dres back in. 

MY DRES AND STILL GILLY AND BIG SMOLDERING CRATER!!!
Over millions of years, Dres is forgotten and tectonic movement means that Gilly and your crater are buried under *my* hill.

I get a jack hammer and give it to the kraken. 

My Dres and Gilly and big rock pile!

> 
> 
> On 4/19/2016 at 7:47 PM, saturnsrings said:
> 
> 
> What mod did you use to get all those stars? & what planets are orbiting around them?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I know kerbols planets are moho, eve, kerbin, duna, dres, jool, sarnus, urlum, neidon, plock.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> And I know that barry has barney, stella has plantar, serious has joker, dollas has polo, don, CZF30, and Kaiser, and corbo has ablate, erin, inaccessible, sentar, and accession.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> But what are the others?
> 

Uhh.. Old Kopernicus Core stuff.

I terraform Dres's canyons into a Hill.

My hill.

![latest?cb=20130506011838](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/kingofthehill/images/0/05/King_of_the_Hill.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20130506011838)
I shoot your terraformed Dres with one of Spud's anti-terraforming nyan cats. My Spud and Dres!

You can have Dres, no one else wants it.

I got the hill, and it has everything Dres doesnt. Like grass and fauna.

I smash you hill with the 1.1 HYPE TRAIN!!! CHOO CHOO!!! Your hill and every solid celestial body within 5 light years not including Dres, Spud, and any asteroids explodes from over hyping. 

Oh, and DRES HATER DETECTED!!! [@Sanic](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/149920-sanic/)! 

BOO DRES HATER!!! ALL DRES HATERS ARE TERRIBLE!

I leave your space potato for another galaxy, where I settle on a new planet with lots of hills. They are very pretty, and I walk around visiting them all without claiming any one as my own. You can have all the Dres hills you want.

Hey, nice hill ya got there. Would be a shame if someone just...

YOINK!

My hill.

Instead of claiming a hill, I claim the planet, with lots of hills.

Therefore, as your hill is on my planet, It's mine.

My hill-covered planet.

I smash your hill with red iron crown badges. 

My hypey hill!

Your hill being hype, it accelerates at Warp Factor 5 away from you.

I come across your hill millions of years later, through space, and claim it as my own.

I shoot you down with an anti-spaceship hype gun, and you crash and explode. 

My hill and pile of debris from your crashed ship!
All your hill are belong to us now.

There is no such thing as "debris". Only potential funds from recovering them with the Klaw.

My fully funded hill.
I destroy your funds and I use ISV Kran to capture Hill.
I use a mass relay to simultaneously destroy your hill and pile up matter in the form of my hill.

However, you forget to say that you captured it. I do that.

My hill.

I leave a pill on the bill of a dill growing on your hill. You take the pill and die after getting ill. Having forgot to put your hill in your will, I take your hill where I will build a mill with my drill.
I shoot the planet towards the sun, destroying your mill and you. Once the planet is where it started, I claim the hill.

hello my name is u n i v e r s a l l pleased to meet you i'm ill really all

you heel, your heal, your îles, your il, yours ills, your hills many many many many more relay mny mny more rely relie really more

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-13T01:02:09Z" title="05/13/2016 01:02  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 13, 2016</time> by WinkAllKerb''**

I mop up all of Wink's gibberish into a small mountain.

My hill of patent nonsense.
